name: Décrocher la lune
description:
This game was made during the Jammin Assembly held in Bordeaux, the weekend of the 9th of November 2019. 

It got awarded first place in the Professional category.

This gamejam was the biggest IRL jam organised in France, as of this date.

Art - Leroy Léa ( lea.lucie.leroy@gmail.com )

Design - Trouvat Benjamin ( benjamin.trouvat@gmail.com )

Dev -
